bill.summary:
Care Corps Demonstration Act of 2018
This bill amends the Public Health Service Act to authorize the Department of Health and Human Services to award grants for local care corps programs. Such programs must provide support services for the elderly and individuals with disabilities, particularly services that promote independent living.
